name: Dodge the bullet (MrEliptik (vico.choco))
description:
!ATTENTION! While the game runs on the browser, I would advise to download the desktop version, as the sound seems to be weird in the browser version.

This is my entry for the Scorespace jam #13, on the theme DODGING with the optional challenge of ONE ROOM.

How to play:
Dodge the bullets, kill the enemies by running over them. Once you killed an enemy, you have 2 seconds to choose another direction if you want to. 

Try to survive as long as possible, and get the highest score!

Controls:

  • Keyboard & mouse:
    • W A S D (or arrow keys or ZQSD) to steer
    • Mouse to aim and launch after killing an enemy
  • Gamepad:
    • Left joystick to steer and aim
    • A to launch after killing an enemy

Music:

Abstraction - Ludum Dare 30 (Track 7) : abstractionmusic.com
